title: Twitter permanently suspended journalist who interviewed Matt Walsh’s hacker
description: Hacker called Doomed delights as First Amendment debate stokes chaos on Twitter.

title: Amazon introduces new feature to make dialogue in its TV shows intelligible
description: It's an accessibility feature, sure, but muddled audio is a problem for everyone.

title: Googlers say Bard AI is “worse than useless,” ethics concerns were ignored
description: Internal employee messages beg Google: "Please do not launch" the Bard AI.

title: Man battling Google wins $500K for search result links calling him a pedophile
description: Google's attempt to apply Section 230 immunity in Canada failed.

title: The FDA would like to remind you not to put amniotic fluid in your eyes
description: Amniotic fluid is mostly just fetal urine—and it's not FDA-approved for eyes.

title: Election conspiracist Mike Lindell must pay $5M to expert who proved him wrong
description: Lindell held "Prove Mike Wrong" contest but refused to pay the winner.

title: Give roundworms some weed and they’ll get the munchies, study finds
description: Work could further our understanding of endocannabinoid system, help drug development.

title: So what was that? Was Starship’s launch a failure or a success?
description: SpaceX's development process is messier, but it's also much faster.

title: Hosting site Imgur will remove explicit and anonymous content next month
description: Older content without account ties also subject to removal, leading to potential link rot.

title: Musk vows to sue as Microsoft drops Twitter from its ad platform
description: It would open a new front in Musk's feud with OpenAI, a company he helped start.

title: Seagate violated export ban by shipping 7 million disk drives to Huawei, US says
description: Seagate's $300 million fine is largest in US Commerce bureau's history.

title: More EVs are eligible for clean vehicle tax credits up to $7,500
description: The ID.4 qualifies for a $7,500 credit, the Rivian R1T and R1S get $3,750.

title: With Tesla profits down, Musk dangles Cybertruck, FSD this year
description: Volume was up but margins were down in Q1 2023.

title: Google to deploy generative AI to create sophisticated ad campaigns
description: Big Tech groups race to incorporate the groundbreaking new tech into their products.

title: RTX 4070 review: An ideal GPU for anyone who skipped the graphics card shortage
description: Skip the 30-series because of shortages and inflated prices? This one's for you.

title: SpaceX to make a second attempt to launch its massive Starship rocket
description: The most likely outcome is that something goes wrong during this flight.
